Package moblima.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddHoliday
    Represents the screen when staff wants to add a holiday
    AddMovie  
    AddShowtime
    Represents the screen for staff to add a new showtime.
    AdminMenu
    Represents the screen for staff Menu displaying all his/her options
    AllMoviesList
    Represents the screen that display all movies in all cineplexes
    BaseMenu
    Represents the home page.
    BookingHistory
    Represents the screen for booking history of a customer
    ChooseCineplex
    Represents the screen to choose a cineplex
    ChooseMovie
    Represents the screen to choose a movie
    ChooseSeats
    Represents the screen where user choose seats for booking
    ChooseShowtime
    Represents the screen to choose a showtime
    EditBaseTicketPrice
    Represents the screen where staff can edit the base price of tickets of the cineplex staff belongs to
    EmailVerification
    Represents the screen to verify email of a customer
    EnterParticulars
    Represents the screen where a customer enters his/her particulars to complete his/her booking
    LeaveReview
    Represents the screen to leave a review on a movie
    LoginVerification
    Represents the screen for staff to login and henceforth verify his/her username and password
    MoviegoerMenu
    Represents the main menu for moviegoer (customer)
    MovieInformation
    Represents the screen that shows all information on a movie
    ReviewList
    Represents the screen that shows all reviews of a movie
    SearchMovie
    Represents the screen to search for any movie by title
    Top5Rating
    Represents the screen that shows top 5 movies by rating
    Top5Sales
    Represents the screen that shows top 5 movies by ticket sales
    UpdateMovie  
    View
    Represents the parent class of all the views Abstract class with abstract methods implemented by its subclasses
